Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 206, Barry Road, East Dulwich, Greater London

item.title: Black bollard on corner of Fordwych Road and Minster Road, 22nd November
item.description:
This bollard is black and unlit. On Friday 14th Nov it was dark and wet and busy and I scraped my car against this bollard as it was invisible. Please add white paint or something to make it visible! Fortunately my insurance will cover the damage but your action would prevent further accidents.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fordwych Road, Kilburn, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mattress on the pavement, 22nd November
item.description:
Someone has left a double bed mattress on the pavement outside 16 Farleigh Road. It has been there for at least one week.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Farleigh Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Disgusting rotting piles of rubbish and food waste!, 22nd November
item.description:
An RCV or street cleaning vehcile has spilt bags of rubbish with rotting piles of food along the footway and in the carriageway. Please send a street cleansing team to clear and jet wash the area and have a mechanical broom sweep the channel.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Honor Oak Road, Forest Hill, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mattress and Headboard - been on the side of the street for days now, 22nd November

item.title: Dumped domestic waste & unwanted bin, 22nd November
item.description:
There is a large bin on the street that has been there for a while. Also people have started flying tipping domestic waste around it. Some of the rubbish are Amazon boxes (so the fly tippers can be tracked and possibly fined). Many thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Silwood Street, Bermondsey, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 20 bags at the junction of Sussex Gardens and Edgware Road, 22nd November
item.description:
Possible missed collection as waste presented outside restaurant in heavy duty black bags. Enforced and this is all domestic waste. Request for Veolia to clear all waste.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 175a, Edgware Road, Paddington, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet
